data.expected_result: The Streamkit page should be able to connect to your Discord Client.
data.short_description: [Firefox Specific] The Streamkit page can't connect to your Discord Client when on Firefox.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open <discord main link>/streamkit. - Scroll down to the row of connections where XSplit and OBS are featured. - Click "Connect to Discord" on either one. - Click either of the "Install for..." buttons on the page that opens. - Wait a few seconds.
